lines.text: I get blamed for everything I do!

[Ralph Phillips opens a hut where Africans were in progress of boiling his parents, alive]
Boiling parents? I warned you Dackory's.
[spoof of Henry Stanley's historic quote "Dr. Livingstone, I presume?" after locating David Livingstone, in Africa, on Friday, October 27th, 1871]
I hated to have to have to kill them all... but they had to be taught a lesson.
HQ to Com Ralph... HQ to Com Ralph... Are you all right?
Turn back! You are being pursued by a multitude of unfriendly Martians who all got A's in arithmetic!
My insurance will cover the cost of the broken window, Mother, take whatever's left and buy yourself a catcher's mitt...

[Ralph imagining he's in a jail cell; whispering]
They're coming to get you, Phillips. They're coming to get you.
[Ralph crushes out a cigarette he was smoking, gets up and walks unafraid toward the door]

[as he opens the door]
You're gonna have to pay for this, Ralph Phillips!

[Fade back to his father standing at the door of Ralph's bedroom]
Yeah, I'm sorry, son, but we're just gonna have to pay for that window out of our allowance.
